meanings.sent2: The dextrorotatory arrow pointed to the east.
meanings.sent3: The dextrorotatory squirrel kept turning right in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her dextrorotatory dance moves led her in a perfect circle.
meanings.sent5: The dextrorotatory motion of the clock's hands was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Turning or twisting in a clockwise direction
meanings.sent1: The dextrorotatory screw tightened to the right.
meanings.sent2: The dextrorotatory vine wound around the tree trunk.
meanings.sent3: The dextrorotatory tornado spun clockwise across the field.
meanings.sent4: His dextrorotatory approach to problem-solving always led to success.
meanings.sent5: The dextrorotatory motion of the windmill blades was efficient.
